parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.84

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Object

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current animation phase of given source. Similar to [[animationSourcePhase]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlAnimationPhaseModel''' source

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control : [[Control]] - 3D control

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> source: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_phase = _control3D [[ctrlAnimationPhaseModel]] "Close";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlAnimateModel]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[displayCtrl]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]]
</value></part></template></root>
